title: Cursor 2.3 Released with Layout Customization
description: Cursor released version 2.3 on December 22, 2025, featuring layout customization options for workspaces along with stability improvements and bug fixes. The update focuses on addressing user concerns about UI stability following the major 2.2 release earlier in the month.

community_feedback.quote: Transition from Plan to Build mode is missing end plan mode

title: Cursor 2.2: Debug Mode and Multi-Agent Judging
description: Major December 2025 update introducing Debug Mode to help reproduce and fix tricky bugs by instrumenting apps with runtime logs, Visual Editor for UI/UX development, Multi-Agent Judging for collaborative AI code review where multiple AI agents evaluate solutions and recommend the best, and Plan Mode improvements with Mermaid diagram support. Enterprise features including Insights, Billing Groups, and Service Accounts were added on December 18.

Review Mode is just freaking me out
Debug Mode fixed my bugs automatically
Multi-agent judging lets AI self-review and compete

title: December 2025 Changelog: Code Assist Telemetry
description: Gemini CLI released December 17, 2025 changelog featuring Code Assist backend telemetry for tracking user accept/reject behavior on suggestions. The project maintains an active weekly release schedule with continued focus on IDE integration enhancements, command usability improvements, and GitHub PR review capabilities. Note: Gemini Code Assist tools were deprecated as of October 14, 2025.
